titleStmt.title: The petition and desires of all the loyall and true-hearted knights, esquires, gentlemen, and free-holders within the county of Essex, to the Honounable [sic] the House of Commons assembled at Westminster, concerning a personall treaty with the King: also, their propositions touching the army and kingdome, together with their desires therein. Agreed upon by the Grand-Jury at the last Generall Assizes holden at Chelmsford, March 22, 1647. And since presented to the Right Honourable the Earl of Warwick, together with His Lordships answer thereunto.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
